mutants.code:
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_vowel_words(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowel_words = re.findall('\\b[aeiou]\\w+', text)
    dict_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in vowel_words:
        dict_count[word] -= 1
    return dict_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_vowel_words(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowel_words = re.findall('', text)
    dict_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in vowel_words:
        dict_count[word] += 1
    return dict_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_vowel_words(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowel_words = re.findall('\\b[aeiou]\\w+', text)
    dict_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in vowel_words:
        dict_count[word] += 2
    return dict_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_vowel_words(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowel_words = re.findall('\\b[aeiou]\\w+', text)
    dict_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in vowel_words:
        dict_count[word] += -1
    return dict_count
